specification.summary: BlueTicket is a French startup launching a B2C web app to sell tickets for local events.
specification.text:
Context

BlueTicket is a French startup planning to launch a B2C web application that allows users to discover and purchase tickets for local events (concerts, talks, indie shows).

Business goals

Let the public search, reserve and pay for tickets online

Provide a lightweight portal for event organizers to publish events

Go live with a minimal viable product within 3 months

Users

General public (EU-based)

Independent event organizers

Functional & Non-functional requirements

Users authenticate with personal accounts (email; MFA preferred but not required initially)

Payments handled via a third-party provider (not selected yet)

RGPD-compliant

Data stored exclusively in the EU

Expected usage:

5,000 active monthly users at launch

Potential growth to 50,000 within a year

Target availability: 99.5%

Future enhancement (not MVP-critical):

refunds

email notifications

Out of scope (MVP)

Native mobile apps

Advanced analytics or reporting
